definitions.text: an activity that diverts or amuses or stimulates
examples: scuba diving is provided as a diversion for tourists
for recreation he wrote poetry and solved crossword puzzles
drug abuse is often regarded as a form of recreation

definitions.text: activity that refreshes and recreates; activity that renews your health and spirits by enjoyment and relaxation
examples: time for rest and refreshment by the pool
days of joyous recreation with his friends
